definition: remaining breath/last gasp
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to gasp/to pant/asthma
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)

sentences.english: But Mr. Lea's being good enough to let them keep dragging on around here.
sentences.chinese: 但是李老爷让他们在这里苟延残喘已经够好心了。

sentences.english: But there are situations where death is a friend.
sentences.chinese: 但有些情形是死亡比敬延残喘更好。

sentences.english: Pai and his associates wanted to get rid of Chiang in order to save something from the wreck of Kuomintang power.
sentences.chinese: 白及其同伙想要除掉蒋，使国民党政权得以苟延残喘。

sentences.english: He was thrown into prison and left to rot.
sentences.chinese: 他被关进监牢任其苟延残喘。

sentences.english: At night, the city, who in the invisible corner alive?
sentences.chinese: 华灯初上的城市，谁在看不见的角落苟延残喘？

sentences.english: Physically, I puked until I couldn't move.
sentences.chinese: 生理上，我残喘着直到不能再动弹。

sentences.english: In addition to a faltering heart in the beating to linger.
sentences.chinese: 除了一颗摇摇欲坠的心在苟延残喘地跳动外。

sentences.english: It is boring to eat, to sleep is fulfilling.
sentences.chinese: 吃饭令人烦，睡觉苟残喘。

definition: to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
to drift through life
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
to live without purpose
to bear humiliation to save one's skin (idiom)
deathbed struggle/final struggle (idiom)
dying
survival/the struggle to eke out a living/to seek for continued existence
decaying/decrepit/aged and crumbling
at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state/imminent crisis/living from hand to mouth
see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]
to approach one's coffin (idiom); with one foot in the grave
lit. the path exhausted, the end of the road (idiom); an impasse/in a plight with no way out/things have reached a dead end
to stand a siege/trapped in a besieged city
to completely lose (one's dignity, vitality etc)
facing death/at death's door
